entry.title: DRAFT: interactive tx construction protocol
entry.summary: In this context, Max is asking Antoine if PSBT (BIP 174) would be a good solution for something, but the specific problem or use case is not mentioned. BIP 174 is a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal that defines Partially Signed Bitcoin Transactions (PSBTs), which are used to allow multiple parties to collaboratively construct and sign Bitcoin transactions without requiring them to share private keys. The proposal is available on GitHub at https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0174.mediawiki.
